form: MSF Mental Health - mhGAP Follow-up v2

translations.Being so restless that it is hard to sit: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
translations.CGI-I (rating of improvement CGI-I: how: CGI-I (rating of  improvement CGI-I: how much has the patient improved at this time?)
translations.CGI-S (rating of severity CGI-S: how men: CGI-S (rating of severity CGI-S: how mentally ill is the patient at this time?)
translations.Did the child complain about pain or dis: Did the child complain about pain or discomfort with his/her body?
translations.Did the child have problem sleeping, suc: Did the child have problem sleeping, such as sleeping too much or not enough?
translations.Did the child have problems getting alon: Did the child have problems getting along with others?
translations.Did the child have problems paying atten: Did the child have problems paying attention, understanding or remembering things?
translations.Did the child have problems playing, doi: Did the child have problems playing, doing chores, homework or other day to day activities?
translations.Did the child have problems with his app: Did the child have problems with his appetite, such as having too little or too much hunger?
translations.Did the child seek comfort and closeness: Did the child seek comfort and closeness from someone?
translations.Did the child wet the bed?: Did the child wet the bed?
translations.Did the patient miss the session?: Did the patient miss the session?
translations.Did you have any problems sleeping, such: Did you have any problems sleeping, such as sleeping too much or not enough?
translations.Did you have problems getting along with: Did you have problems getting along with family or friends?
translations.Did you have problems performing daily a: Did you have problems performing daily activities, such as cooking, bathing, or chores outside the household?
translations.Enter in \"Vitals\" today's measurements: Enter in "Vitals" today's measurements for "weight", "blood pressure" and "heart rate"
translations.Feeling afraid as if something awful mig: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
translations.Feeling bad about yourself - or that you: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
translations.Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
translations.Feeling tired or having little energy?: Feeling tired or having little energy?
translations.Follow up session required? (If no, fill: Follow up session required? (If no, fill the Exit form)
translations.GAD7 - Over the last two weeks, how ofte: GAD7 - Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
translations.Have you been bothered by unpleasant tho: Have you been bothered by unpleasant thoughts, worries or ideas?
translations.Have you felt sad or nervous?: Have you felt sad or nervous?
translations.If change of medication, rationale for t: If change of medication, rationale for the change
translations.If you checked off any problems, how dif: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
translations.In general, how helpful were the therape: In general, how helpful were the therapeutic or counselling sessions FOR YOU?
In general, how helpful were the therapeutic or counselling sessions FOR YOUR CHILD?
translations.In general, in the past week, how well h: In general, in the past week, how well has the child been feeling?
translations.Is the patient taking the medication as: Is the patient taking the medication as prescribed?
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?
translations.Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
translations.Not being able to stop or control worryi: Not being able to stop or control worrying
translations.PHQ9 - Over the last two weeks, how ofte: PHQ9 - Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
translations.Patient rescheduled (if Yes, fill the Fo: Patient rescheduled (if Yes, fill the Follow-up section at the end of this form. If No (closing file or patient no longer wants services), fill the Exit form.)
translations.Side effects from current treatment - Ex: Side effects from current treatment - Extra Pyramidal
translations.Side effects from current treatment - Me: Side effects from current treatment - Metabolic
translations.Side effects from current treatment - Ot: Side effects from current treatment - Others
translations.Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
translations.Trouble concentrating on things, such as: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
translations.Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sl: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
translations.Update medications if there's a change: Update medications if there's a change
translations.Was the child sad or irritable?: Was the child sad or irritable?
translations.Was the child worried or scared?: Was the child worried or scared?
translations.Worrying too much about different things: Worrying too much about different things
translations.mhGAP forms are to be filled only by mhG: mhGAP forms are to be filled only by mhGAP clinician (Clinical officer / GP / nurse trained in mhGAP / psychiatrist)
